original_text: They made the onyx stones, enclosed in settings of gold filigree, and engraved like the engravings of a signet, according to the names of the sons of Israel.
korean_text: 그들은 또 호마노를 깎아 금 테에 물려 도장을 새김 같이 이스라엘의 아들들의 이름을 그것에 새겨

sentences.original_text: enclosed in settings of gold filigree,
and engraved like the engravings of a signet,
according to the names of the sons of Israel.
